posts.title: First post
posts.text: This is the 1st post of my page. Thanks to my co-worker / friend, i learn about the hexo. currently, i just fix some problems about the themes and categories. i will upload my cv , researches and . . . seminars. Thx. P.S, maybe i need to make some suitable english names. idk.
